About Me

A

I have completed my Master of Arts in Economics degree from FS University, Shikohabad. My aim in life is to expand the horizon of my knowledge by contributing to the society while working in a collaborative and corporative environment, and by giving my best in every field and every situation I am put into. My keen interest lies in conducting research in the field of Economics, particularly in exploring its intersections with various facets of everyday life, such as the transformative impact of Industry 4.0, the dynamics of healthcare systems, and the critical importance of environmental sustainability.

Educational Background

Post Graduation

FS University
Master of Arts - Economics
Sept 2022 - Jul 2024

During my period at FS University I aim to learn more about the depths of Economics as well as learn about other technical fields and contribute to their research as well.

Reserach Topics include - Green Economics, Indian GDP, Industry 4.0, Financial Cybersecurtiy, Ethical AI and many more.

Graduation

Galgotias University
Bachelor of Arts - Economics
Aug 2019 - Jun 2022

During my time in the university, I learnt to carve my niche in different fields of research. As a part of the academic activities, I wrote a thesis titled, "Caste v/s Class: An analytical study of the society" which focused on relating the economic factor to the prevailing issue of caste segregation in India.

Schooling

Green Field Academy,
Lakhimpur Kheri
Apr 2014 - Mar 2018

My time at Green Field Academy was a very productive and formative period, it helped me in developing my interpersonal skills as well as taught me the importance of making connections. My school also provided me with the platform to develop my oratory skills by participating in many debates and elocutions.
